INSTALL
  * Copy kml.class.php in your tree
  * In your PHP include kml.class.php
      Ex : include_once('kml.class.php');
  * Start using it (see manual and example)
   
UPGRADE
  * Copy kml.class.php in place of the old file
  * start using it (see manual and example)
